optical_surface.comment: number of channel surfaces and temp https://www.cosmos.esa.int/web/jwst-nirspec/nirspec-s-design

dispersion.comment: Dispersion law. Val is the reference pixel, i.e. the centre of the array

wfno_x.comment: Image space f/# based on online source https://www.cosmos.esa.int/web/jwst-nirspec/nirspec-s-design assume diffraction limited in this wavelength range

wfno_y.comment: Image space f/# based on online source

osf.comment: Oversample each detector pixel by this amount. Need to be changed

array_geometry.comment: SUB2048 2048x32 subarray mode needed for full spectrum

qe_rms_matrix_file.comment: [Default 'None'] Path to CSV file containing matrix of QE of pixels.

Idc.comment: Detector dark current based on average of 0.0092 and 0.0057 for the 2 detectors https://jwst-docs.stsci.edu/display/JTI/NIRSpec+Detector+Performance

sigma_ro.comment: Detector readout noise based Giardino 2012 SPIE https://dms.cosmos.esa.int/COSMOS/doc_fetch.php?id=3371528

full_well.comment: 57750= average of 55100 and 60400 https://jwst-docs.stsci.edu/display/JTI/NIRSpec+Detector+Performance 65000 from pandexo online

pc_fw.comment: maximum percent of full well to which any pixel can reach

nGND.comment: duration of reset event in units of frame time

nNDR0.comment: Integration time of zeroth NDR in units of frame time

nRST.comment: Time lapse between last NDR and reset in units of frame time
